words: again / once more / re- / second / another / then (after sth, and not until then) / no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
over and over again / again and again
to continue the struggle (idiom); to persist / unremitting efforts
